languages.text:
Получить {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}металлолом{/g} можно с разбитых в бою кораблей врага и из некоторых других источников.
В случае острой нехватки металлолома на ремонт можно разобрать ранее улучшенный системный компонент и вернуть часть металлолома, затраченного на улучшение.

You can collect {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} from destroyed enemy ships and from a few other sources.
If you find yourself in desperate need of scrap to make repairs, you can dismantle an upgrade from one of the system {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g} and receive a portion of the scrap you spent on the upgrade.
languages.original_text:
Получить {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}металлолом{/g} можно с разбитых в бою кораблей врага и из некоторых других источников.
В случае острой нехватки металлолома на ремонт можно разобрать ранее улучшенный системный компонент и вернуть часть металлолома, затраченного на улучшение.

traits.locale_text:
You can collect scrap from destroyed enemy ships and from a few other sources.
If you find yourself in desperate need of scrap to make repairs, you can dismantle an upgrade from one of the system components and receive a portion of the scrap you spent on the upgrade.

You can collect scrap from destroyed enemy ships and from a few other sources.
If you find yourself in desperate need of scrap to make repairs, you can dismantle an upgrade from one of the system components and receive a portion of the scrap you spent on the upgrade.

You can collect scrap from destroyed enemy ships and from a few other sources.
If you find yourself in desperate need of scrap to make repairs, you can dismantle an upgrade from one of the system components and receive a portion of the scrap you spent on the upgrade.

You can collect {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} from destroyed enemy ships and from a few other sources.
If you find yourself in desperate need of scrap to make repairs, you can dismantle an upgrade from one of the system {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g} and receive a portion of the scrap you spent on the upgrade.

You can collect {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} from destroyed enemy ships and from a few other sources.
If you find yourself in desperate need of scrap to make repairs, you can dismantle an upgrade from one of the system {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g} and receive a portion of the scrap you spent on the upgrade.

languages.text:
Du kannst {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}Schrott{/g} von zerstörten feindlichen Schiffen und einigen anderen Quellen erhalten.
Wenn du dringend Schrott für Reparaturen benötigst, kannst du ein Upgrade von einer der {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}Systemkomponenten{/g} demontieren und einen Teil des Schrotts erhalten, den du für das Upgrade benutzt hast.
languages.original_text:
You can collect {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} from destroyed enemy ships and from a few other sources.
If you find yourself in desperate need of scrap to make repairs, you can dismantle an upgrade from one of the system {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g} and receive a portion of the scrap you spent on the upgrade.

traits.locale_text:
Du kannst {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}Schrott{/g} von zerstörten feindlichen Schiffen und einigen anderen Quellen erhalten.
Wenn du dringend Schrott für Reparaturen benötigst, kannst du ein Upgrade von einer der Systemkomponenten demontieren und einen Teil des Schrotts erhalten, den du für das Upgrade benutzt hast.

languages.text:
Les vaisseaux ennemis détruits et quelques autres sources vous permettent d'obtenir des {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}pièces de récupération{/g}.
Si vous avez désespérément besoin de pièces de récupération pour procéder à certaines réparations, vous pouvez démonter une amélioration apportée à un {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}composant{/g} système et récupérer une partie des pièces qu'elle comportait.
languages.original_text:
You can collect {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} from destroyed enemy ships and from a few other sources.
If you find yourself in desperate need of scrap to make repairs, you can dismantle an upgrade from one of the system {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g} and receive a portion of the scrap you spent on the upgrade.

traits.locale_text:
Les vaisseaux ennemis détruits et quelques autres sources vous permettent d'obtenir des {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}pièces de récupération{/g}.
Si vous avez désespérément besoin de pièces de récupération pour procéder aux réparations, vous pouvez démonter une amélioration sur un composant système et récupérer une partie des pièces qu'elle comportait.

languages.text:
您可以通过被摧毁的敌舰与其他来源收集{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}废料{/g}。
如果您迫切需要废料维修舰船，您可以对某些系统{g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}组件{/g}进行降级，回收升级消耗的一部分废料，用来维修舰船。
languages.original_text:
You can collect {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} from destroyed enemy ships and from a few other sources.
If you find yourself in desperate need of scrap to make repairs, you can dismantle an upgrade from one of the system {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g} and receive a portion of the scrap you spent on the upgrade.

traits.locale_text:
您可以通过被摧毁的敌舰与其他来源收集{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}废料{/g}。
如果您迫切需要废料维修舰船，您可以对某些系统组件进行降级，回收升级消耗的一部分废料，用来维修舰船。

languages.text:
Puedes recabar {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}chatarra{/g} de las naves enemigas destruidas y de varias fuentes distintas.
En caso de que necesites chatarra para hacer reparaciones urgentes, puedes desmontar una mejora de algún {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}componente{/g} de sistema y recibir una parte de la chatarra que invertiste en ella.
languages.original_text:
You can collect {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} from destroyed enemy ships and from a few other sources.
If you find yourself in desperate need of scrap to make repairs, you can dismantle an upgrade from one of the system {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g} and receive a portion of the scrap you spent on the upgrade.

traits.locale_text:
Puedes recabar {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}chatarra{/g} de las naves enemigas destruidas y de varias fuentes distintas.
En caso de que necesites chatarra para hacer reparaciones urgentes, puedes desmontar una mejora de algún componente de sistema y recibir una parte de la chatarra que invertiste en ella.

languages.original_text:
Scrap metal can be obtained from enemy ships wrecked in battle and from some other sources.
In the event of an acute shortage of scrap metal for repairs, you can disassemble a previously improved system component and recover some of the scrap metal spent on the improvement.

languages.text:
破壊された敵船から{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}スクラップ{/g}やその他の資源を回収できる。
修繕のためのスクラップがどうしても必要な場合は、いずれかのシステムのアップグレードを解除し、そのアップグレードで消費したスクラップの{g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}一部{/g}を獲得することができる。
languages.original_text:
You can collect {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} from destroyed enemy ships and from a few other sources.
If you find yourself in desperate need of scrap to make repairs, you can dismantle an upgrade from one of the system {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g} and receive a portion of the scrap you spent on the upgrade.

traits.locale_text:
破壊された敵船から{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}スクラップ{/g}やその他の資源を回収できる。
修繕のためのスクラップがどうしても必要な場合は、いずれかのシステムのアップグレードを解除し、アップグレードの際に使用したスクラップの一部を獲得することもできる。

languages.text:
İmha edilen gemilerden ve birkaç başka kaynaktan {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}hurda{/g} toplayabilirsin.
Acil onarım için hurda gerekiyorsa ve başka kaynaktan elde edemiyorsan sistem {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}bileşenlerinden{/g} birinden bir terfiyi sökebilir ve terfi için harcadığın hurdanın bir kısmını geri kazanabilirsin.
languages.original_text:
You can collect {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} from destroyed enemy ships and from a few other sources.
If you find yourself in desperate need of scrap to make repairs, you can dismantle an upgrade from one of the system {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g} and receive a portion of the scrap you spent on the upgrade.
